@changesets/cli.name: @changesets/cli
@changesets/cli.description: Organise your package versioning and publishing to make both contributors and maintainers happy
@changesets/cli.author: Changesets Contributors

@commitlint/config-conventional.name: @commitlint/config-conventional
@commitlint/config-conventional.description: Shareable commitlint config enforcing conventional commits
@commitlint/config-conventional.author: Mario Nebl <hello@herebecode.com>

@eslint/eslintrc.name: @eslint/eslintrc
@eslint/eslintrc.description: The legacy ESLintRC config file format for ESLint
@eslint/eslintrc.author: Nicholas C. Zakas

@rollup/plugin-node-resolve.name: @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
@rollup/plugin-node-resolve.description: Locate and bundle third-party dependencies in node_modules
@rollup/plugin-node-resolve.author: Rich Harris <richard.a.harris@gmail.com>

@rollup/plugin-typescript.name: @rollup/plugin-typescript
@rollup/plugin-typescript.description: Seamless integration between Rollup and TypeScript.
@rollup/plugin-typescript.author: Oskar Segersvärd

@typescript-eslint/parser.name: @typescript-eslint/parser
@typescript-eslint/parser.description: An ESLint custom parser which leverages TypeScript ESTree

@typescript-eslint/type-utils.name: @typescript-eslint/type-utils
@typescript-eslint/type-utils.description: Type utilities for working with TypeScript + ESLint together

@typescript-eslint/types.name: @typescript-eslint/types
@typescript-eslint/types.description: Types for the TypeScript-ESTree AST spec

@typescript-eslint/typescript-estree.name: @typescript-eslint/typescript-estree
@typescript-eslint/typescript-estree.description: A parser that converts TypeScript source code into an ESTree compatible form

@typescript-eslint/utils.name: @typescript-eslint/utils
@typescript-eslint/utils.description: Utilities for working with TypeScript + ESLint together

@typescript-eslint/visitor-keys.name: @typescript-eslint/visitor-keys
@typescript-eslint/visitor-keys.description: Visitor keys used to help traverse the TypeScript-ESTree AST

commitizen.name: commitizen
commitizen.description: Git commit, but play nice with conventions.
commitizen.author: Jim Cummins <jimthedev@gmail.com> (https://github.com/jimthedev)

cz-git.name: cz-git
cz-git.description: A better customizable and git support commitizen adapter
cz-git.author: Zhengqbbb <zhengqbbb@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Zhengqbbb)

eslint.name: eslint
eslint.description: An AST-based pattern checker for JavaScript.
eslint.author: Nicholas C. Zakas <nicholas+npm@nczconsulting.com>

eslint-import-resolver-node.name: eslint-import-resolver-node
eslint-import-resolver-node.description: Node default behavior import resolution plugin for eslint-plugin-import.
eslint-import-resolver-node.author: Ben Mosher (me@benmosher.com)

eslint-module-utils.name: eslint-module-utils
eslint-module-utils.description: Core utilities to support eslint-plugin-import and other module-related plugins.
eslint-module-utils.author: Ben Mosher <me@benmosher.com>

eslint-plugin-es-x.name: eslint-plugin-es-x
eslint-plugin-es-x.description: ESLint plugin about ECMAScript syntactic features.
eslint-plugin-es-x.author: Toru Nagashima (https://github.com/mysticatea)

eslint-plugin-eslint-comments.name: eslint-plugin-eslint-comments
eslint-plugin-eslint-comments.description: Additional ESLint rules for ESLint directive comments.
eslint-plugin-eslint-comments.author: Toru Nagashima

eslint-plugin-html.name: eslint-plugin-html
eslint-plugin-html.description: A ESLint plugin to lint and fix inline scripts contained in HTML files.

eslint-plugin-i.name: eslint-plugin-i
eslint-plugin-i.description: A fork of `eslint-plugin-import` using `get-tsconfig` to replace `tsconfig-paths` and heavy `typescript` under the hood.
eslint-plugin-i.author: Ben Mosher <me@benmosher.com>

eslint-plugin-jsonc.name: eslint-plugin-jsonc
eslint-plugin-jsonc.description: ESLint plugin for JSON, JSONC and JSON5 files.
eslint-plugin-jsonc.author: Yosuke Ota

eslint-plugin-markdown.name: eslint-plugin-markdown
eslint-plugin-markdown.description: An ESLint plugin to lint JavaScript in Markdown code fences.

eslint-plugin-no-only-tests.name: eslint-plugin-no-only-tests
eslint-plugin-no-only-tests.description: ESLint rule for .only blocks in mocha tests
eslint-plugin-no-only-tests.author: Levi Buzolic

eslint-plugin-promise.name: eslint-plugin-promise
eslint-plugin-promise.description: Enforce best practices for JavaScript promises
eslint-plugin-promise.author: jden <jason@denizac.org>

eslint-plugin-unused-imports.name: eslint-plugin-unused-imports
eslint-plugin-unused-imports.description: Report and remove unused es6 modules
eslint-plugin-unused-imports.author: Mikkel Holmer Pedersen

eslint-plugin-yml.name: eslint-plugin-yml
eslint-plugin-yml.description: This ESLint plugin provides linting rules for YAML.
eslint-plugin-yml.author: Yosuke Ota

eslint-rule-composer.name: eslint-rule-composer
eslint-rule-composer.description: A utility for composing ESLint rules from other ESLint rules
eslint-rule-composer.author: Teddy Katz

eslint-visitor-keys.name: eslint-visitor-keys
eslint-visitor-keys.description: Constants and utilities about visitor keys to traverse AST.
eslint-visitor-keys.author: Toru Nagashima (https://github.com/mysticatea)

fs-extra.name: fs-extra
fs-extra.description: fs-extra contains methods that aren't included in the vanilla Node.js fs package. Such as recursive mkdir, copy, and remove.
fs-extra.author: JP Richardson <jprichardson@gmail.com>

happy-dom.name: happy-dom
happy-dom.description: Happy DOM is a JavaScript implementation of a web browser without its graphical user interface. It includes many web standards from WHATWG DOM and HTML.
happy-dom.author: David Ortner

husky.name: husky
husky.description: Modern native Git hooks made easy
husky.author: Typicode <typicode@gmail.com>

jsonc-eslint-parser.name: jsonc-eslint-parser
jsonc-eslint-parser.description: JSON, JSONC and JSON5 parser for use with ESLint plugins
jsonc-eslint-parser.author: Yosuke Ota

prettier.name: prettier
prettier.description: Prettier is an opinionated code formatter
prettier.author: James Long

ts-node.name: ts-node
ts-node.description: TypeScript execution environment and REPL for node.js, with source map support

typescript.name: typescript
typescript.description: TypeScript is a language for application scale JavaScript development
typescript.author: Microsoft Corp.

vite.name: vite
vite.description: Native-ESM powered web dev build tool
vite.author: Evan You

vite-plugin-singlefile.name: vite-plugin-singlefile
vite-plugin-singlefile.description: Vite plugin for inlining JavaScript and CSS resources
vite-plugin-singlefile.author: richard@tallent.us

vitest.name: vitest
vitest.description: A blazing fast unit test framework powered by Vite
vitest.author: Anthony Fu <anthonyfu117@hotmail.com>

vue.name: vue
vue.description: The progressive JavaScript framework for building modern web UI.
vue.author: Evan You

vue-eslint-parser.name: vue-eslint-parser
vue-eslint-parser.description: The ESLint custom parser for `.vue` files.
vue-eslint-parser.author: Toru Nagashima

yaml-eslint-parser.name: yaml-eslint-parser
yaml-eslint-parser.description: A YAML parser that produces output compatible with ESLint
yaml-eslint-parser.author: Yosuke Ota
